alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:01PM EDT until May 19 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR OWSLEY...WEST CENTRAL BREATHITT AND SOUTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 501 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scoville, or over Booneville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Turin, Booneville, Lower Buffalo, Stay, Lone and Athol. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
